Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Northbound Reroute near University/56th
ShortDescription: Northbound 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temp. rerouted via: University, 57th, Woodlawn and Garfield. due to, street blockage near University/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via: University, 57th, Woodlawn and Garfield. due to, street blockage near University/56th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
